item.description:
For November we'll update on our Wings and Wheels Snow Event. As well as our Young Eagles event.

As an added bonus, Jim Bisson has lined up another special night for us.

Ever wonder about weather to go/no go? Where to look and what to look at? Well, here we go...

Scott Reynolds, a Meteorologist from Boston Center will help you through this airmet. The title of the topic is "Understanding Aviation Weather".

Our friend, Jim Adams from the FAA FAAST TEAM will be sending this out as a Wings program to about 3000 pilots in NE. Reserve your seats both online with us and with FAA when you get their notifications.

This should be a packed house again...

See you all soon.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

Where else can you have this much excitement for $25 bucks a year?

Fly Often and Fly Safe,
Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454 November Meetup
